translation1: "Heating effect: Good, Thinness: Convenient, Appearance material: Satisfactory, HP Elite has always been known for its high performance-to-price ratio. The new machine is excellent. The heating effect is good, the thinness is convenient, and the appearance material is satisfactory. It is worth recommending.This HP Omen 15 gaming laptop is well-made and of good quality, with durable materials and a reputable brand. In terms of price, it is not too expensive. Personally, I think the HP Omen 15 gaming laptop is great, with good gaming performance: the gameplay is refreshing, and I can play most games smoothly. My fps is always high and stable, and the game is very smooth, even in lol, CSgo is also easily won, and most three-A games can be played.Heat dissipation effect: The heat dissipation effect is not bad, the fan is very powerful, and the working noise is low. The gaming effect is fully opened, and the fan is still not small.  Appearance material: The appearance is very cool and showy. The game's built-in fan display effect: The screen is very clear, and playing games at 1080p is enough. Buying a notebook feels pretty good. It's mainly used for design, and the price-to-performance ratio is high. It's lighter than expected and more attractive than imagined. The red on the buttocks is a very good-looking purple wine color, not too flashy, and the overall performance exceeds expectations by a lot. It's a great value to buy, and it's suitable for girls too.Two years ago, I started contacting the HKG Night Rider, and it took me two years to get used to it. The quality is very high, and the price-performance ratio is quite good! My friends around me also recommended me to buy this product! I have already bought three machines from this series!The appearance is beautiful and eye-catching, and the configuration is also very suitable for giving to grandchildren. I originally planned to wait for the 418 banking activities, but he used it urgently, so I had to buy it early. As a result, I didn't catch up with the bank's big event, which was a little regrettable. However, the product's quality-to-price ratio is still very high, the logistics is also very fast, and I will come back to review after a period of time.This is a brand new, high-performance gaming notebook computer with excellent cost performance. The design style is very good, and it has already been installed with Windows 11 and Office 2019, showing a good display effect. It was bought for children to use for 3D rendering, and the software has been installed. The children said they could use it without any problems. This notebook computer has excellent performance in 3D design work. It was bought for my son, and he said it was very good.The computer is great, especially the customer service is very good. They are very helpful if you don't understand something, and the recommendation to buy is also very good. The graphics when playing games are truly amazing."

translation1: "Is it because the bathtub is leaking electricity? Choosing an appropriate bathtub can have a good therapeutic effect on your feet. Today, the country's small editor will answer this question and hope to be helpful to friends. With the enhancement of people's health awareness, bathtubs are increasingly favored by consumers, and a variety of products with different specifications have emerged on the market, ranging from hundreds of yuan to thousands of yuan, providing consumers with a wide range of choices.On the relevant data, compared to traditional home appliances, healthcare appliances such as foot baths are selling like hotcakes. However, there is no dedicated industry standard for foot baths, which poses a certain safety risk. \"It's too dangerous to soak your feet in electric water, isn't it?\" Mr. Li told the reporter. Recently, he bought a foot bath as a gift for his father's birthday, but when his father soaked his feet, he felt a tingling sensation in his soles.Mr. Li initially thought it was the vibration function of the bathtub that was causing the sensation in his feet, but he didn't realize that he had turned off the vibration function. Even after turning off the vibration function, his father still felt a tingling sensation in his feet. Mr. Li tried writing with a pen, and to his surprise, the pen lit up. Mr. Li discovered that the water in the bathtub was electrified. Later, he contacted the store and the store's attitude was not bad, even though he returned the bathtub, Mr. Li still felt unhappy.Because he discovered that there is no clear and detailed industry regulation on the popular bathtub that has been around for a long time, such as how to set the highest temperature, which group of people it is suitable for, what materials are guaranteed to be safe, etc. However, in general, bathtubs are not prone to have electrical problems, but it is not ruled out that some products may not have been strictly inspected during the manufacturing process. Therefore, it is recommended to choose a disassembled bathtub when purchasing.Water and electricity separation has no safety hazards. At the same time, you can freely take an electric pen test."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "4", "Explanation": "The text is mostly fluent with good grammar and style. However, there are minor issues of unnatural wording. For instance, phrases like 'the country's small editor', 'soak your feet in electric water', 'a disassembled bathtub', and 'freely take an electric pen test' have a slight awkwardness in English. The narrative begins with the 'bathtub', which is then replaced by 'foot bath', causing a small level of ambiguity. However, these issues do not significantly impact the overall comprehension of the text." } }

translation1: "A group of Asian-American organizations filed a complaint with the U.S. Department of Education and the Justice Department on May 23, protesting against three Ivy League schools - Harvard University, Brown University, and Dartmouth College - for discriminating against Asian-American applicants in the admissions process. The Asian American Education Foundation, which led the complaint, held a press conference in Washington D.C. on the same day.The chairman of this group, Zhao Yuchun, said at the press conference that in the past 10 years, the number of Asian applicants who meet the admission criteria of American top universities has doubled, but in these three top American universities, the proportion of Asians remains basically the same. Many studies have shown that these universities discriminate against Asian applicants in the \"holistic consideration\" admission process. Zhao Yuchun introduced that a study by Sanders and others in 2014 showed that in these three universities, the admission rate for Asians was the lowest among all ethnic groups relative to the number of applicants.The data from the US Department of Education also shows that among all Ivy League schools, Brown University and Dartmouth College have the lowest admission rates for Asian students. Yale University and Brown University have implemented de facto racial quotas for Asian applicants for over 20 years. Zhao Yushuo told a reporter from Xinhua that they hope to submit a complaint to the US Department of Education and the Justice Department to investigate and take action after the fact to prevent these universities from continuing to discriminate against Asians in their admissions. They also hope that the universities that have been complained about will proactively address this issue and change their admission policies towards Asians.Currently, the three schools that have been complained about have not made any responses. The Asian American Education Alliance was established in 2015, when it filed a complaint against Harvard University's discriminatory admissions practices. However, the US Department of Education did not accept the complaint due to procedural reasons. This time, in addition to the Chinese-American organizations that participated in the complaint, there were also Indian-American, Korean-American, Japanese-American, and Pakistani-American education organizations that participated in the complaint."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent, with no grammatical errors, unnatural wording, or stiff syntax. The ideas are clearly presented, and any reader would easily understand the message being conveyed." } }

translation1: "According to the video conference of the 2022 graduates of Beijing universities held by the Beijing Municipal Education Commission and the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau, it is expected that there will be 26.8 million graduates in the Beijing area in 2022, an increase of 1.6 million compared to last year. The relevant personnel of the Beijing Municipal Human Resources and Social Security Bureau said that they will deploy job placement work for Beijing university graduates from the aspects of strengthening supply and demand matching, enhancing policy support, expanding job channels, ensuring difficult assistance, supporting innovation and entrepreneurship, and improving service efficiency.Journalists have learned that the Human Resources and Social Security Bureau of Beijing Municipality will build a practical platform and increase the number of job positions, proactively contact 40 universities to set up graduate employment experience bases, visit recruiting units, and integrate demand and position information. They will focus on the \"six-in-one\" strategy, that is, expanding the recruitment of a batch of industries, expanding the recruitment of a batch of state-owned enterprises, expanding the recruitment of a batch of grassroots projects, expanding the recruitment of a batch of conscripts, expanding the recruitment of a batch of internships and employment, and expanding the recruitment of a batch of entrepreneurship-driven employment. They will implement \"one-for-life\" dynamic management, recommending at least 5 job position information for each graduate, ensuring that 100% of difficult-to-employ graduate families have job opportunities."
gpt_response: { "Fluency": { "Score": "5", "Explanation": "The text is highly fluent. It is well organized and grammatically correct, with no unnatural wording or stiff syntax. All ideas are clear and comprehensible." } }
